Package mygame.game

Class PlayerInteraction

java.lang.Object
mygame.game.PlayerInteraction
public class PlayerInteraction
extends java.lang.Object
Class that represents a PlayerInteraction. This class is meant to be used in Connectors when a Player interacts with it

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor for the PlayerInteraction.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerInteraction

      public PlayerInteraction​(Player player, int cooldown)
      Constructor for the PlayerInteraction. It instanciates the interaction time as the moment of creation
      Parameters:
      player - Player that made the interaction
      cooldown - Connector's cooldown

      Getter for the interaction time
      Returns:

    • getElapsedTime

      public long getElapsedTime()
      Getter for the elapsed time between the interaction and the end of cooldown
      Returns:
      ammount of time passed, in seconds

    • isCooldownOver

      public boolean isCooldownOver()
      Checks if the interaction cooldown for the Player is over
      Returns:
      true if the cooldown is over; false if the cooldown is not over
